featured.text: Traders from Asia had already visited the islands 900 years before the arrival of its first permanent settlers from the African mainland (around 1000 AD).
Such dimples are not a permanent trait, for they vanish when the excessive fat goes away.
What are the characteristics of Jeanie’s Kiddie Stool? (A) Permanent and foldable.

definition.zh_def: 永久的，持久的，不會改變或消失的。
definition.en_def: Lasting or intended to last indefinitely without change.
definition.example: She decided to get a permanent tattoo.
